description:
Keep it simple with these wired earbuds. Whether you’re plugging these into your phone, or your vintage Walkman, the Ink’d Earbuds will help you enjoy your tunes. The inline single button controller and mic is strategically placed to ensure your calls sound great.

  • Small and medium ear gels included, letting you customize your fit
  • Single button controller works with calls and as an inline music control
  • Ultralight designs comes in an 11.5g
name: Skullcandy Ink'd+ Earbuds with Microphone
